---

This _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dueling pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=201)_ is fashioned from silvery steel that glistens with a radiant light. You can choose to make a [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attack with the _redeemer's pistol_ without taking a –2 penalty; if you do so, the attack deals 1d6 additional mental damage. You can also call forth the redemptive spirit within the gun to pass judgment on your foes.
